name: Antonio
passive: Gains 10% more damage every 10 levels (max +50%).
unlock: Available by default

passive: Gains 10% more experience every 5 levels (max +30%).
unlock: Available by default

name: Pasqualina
passive: Projectiles get 10% faster every 5 levels (max +30%).
unlock: Available by default

passive: Permanent +1 projectile (all weapons).
unlock: Available by default

passive: gains -5% Cooldown every 10 levels until level 30.
unlock: Get Fire Wand to level 4

name: Porta
passive: Permanent +30% Area. Starts with temporary cooldown bonus.
unlock: Get Ligtning Ring to level 4

name: Lama
passive: Gains +5% Might, MoveSpeed, and Curse every 10 levels (max +20%).
unlock: Survive 20 minutes with at least 10% Curse active.

name: Poe
passive: Permanent +25% pickup radius and -30 max health.
unlock: Get Garlic to level 7.

name: Clerici
passive: Permanent +0.5 HP/s and +50 Max Health. Starts with temporary area bonus.
unlock: Recover a total of 1,000 HP.

name: Dommario
passive: Permanent +40% duration and speed, -40% move speed.
unlock: Earn 5,000 coins in a single run.

name: Krochi
passive: Starts with 1 revival. Gains 1 more Revival at level 33.
unlock: Defeat a total of 100,000 enemies.

unlock: Get Pentagram to Level 7.

unlock: Find and open the coffin in Mad Forest.

unlock: Find and open the coffin in Galio Tower.

unlock: Defeat a total of 3000 Lion Heads.

unlock: Defeat a total of 3000 Dragon Shrimps.

name: Smith

unlock: Sometimes you just need to ask for help.

name: Random
passive: The character is presented with one of eight names, selected at random
unlock: Look under previously owned coffins.

name: Marrabbio
passive: Starts with -110% Projectile Speed meaning projectiles will shoot backwards
unlock: Follow the trail after pillaging Pummarola and Skull O'Maniac from the Mad Forest.

name: Minnah
passive: Might, Projectile Speed, Duration, Area, and Cooldown change every minute.
unlock: Deal with the consequence of stealing cheese from the Dairy Plant.

name: Leda
passive: Starts with 100% Might
unlock: Investigate the bottom of Gallo Tower.

name: Cosmo
passive: Gains +1 Recovery and +1% Luck every level. Gains +1 Revival every 100 levels. Has hidden weapons.
unlock: With a pure heart and two good friends, visit the fiery balcony in Cappella Magna.

name: Peppino
passive: Starts with temporarily reduced area.
unlock: Be a good boy in Il Molise.

name: Trouser
passive: Gains +1% Greed every level. Gold Fever lasts longer.
unlock: Master all 16 accessories in Moongolow.

name: MissingNo
passive: MissingNo's base stats are randomized every time the character selection screen is opened. The final stat is determined by the base stat and the stat from PowerUps.
unlock: With the most adverse fate in Green Acres, run off the edge of the world.

name: Gains
passive: Gains +2% Growth every level.
unlock: Find the only one place where flowers bloom in The Bone Zone.

name: Gyorunton
passive: Gains +1% Curse every level. Can find evolutions in any Treasure.
unlock: Survive the Boss Rash with just one weapon.

name: Red Death
passive: starts with +100% Movement Speed, 255 Max Health and +20% Might.
unlock: Settle the score with the Reaper.
